definitions: The fragrant rhizome of certain species of iris, especially Iris germanica florentina and Iris pallida, used in perfumery, cosmetics, and as a fixative.
A powder made from the dried and ground rhizome of the orris plant.
examples: Orris root is a traditional ingredient in potpourri.
She added a pinch of orris root to the herbal blend.
The perfume contained notes of violet and orris root.
